data: HEM / NEPH Plasma Exchange (PLEX) q3day a week for 1 month (Day of Treatment)
Indication: Anti-GBM with pulmonary hemorrhage, Exchange Volume (mL): 2,000, Target Fluid Balance: 100%
Indication: Antibody Mediated Encephalitis, Exchange Volume (mL): 2,000, Target Fluid Balance: 100%
Indication: CAPS, Exchange Volume (mL): 2,000, Target Fluid Balance: 100%

Indication: Recurrent FSGS, Exchange Volume (mL): 2,000, Target Fluid Balance: 100%
Indication: Multiple Sclerosis, Exchange Volume (mL): 2,000, Target Fluid Balance: 100%

Indication: TTP, Exchange Volume (mL): 2,000, Target Fluid Balance: 100%
Indication: Other, Exchange Volume (mL): 2,000, Target Fluid Balance: 100%
